trans-unit.target: TEXT_LUCKZC011_03394_SEQ_00<tab><var 48 F201FC /var><var 49 F201FD /var> Quest Sync<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> The pixie flowerkeep is seething with fury.
TEXT_LUCKZC011_03394_PIXIE03394_000_000<tab>Grrr, I am flapping mad right now! Some wicked mortals snuck into Il Mheg and tried to steal our flowers!
TEXT_LUCKZC011_03394_PIXIE03394_000_001<tab>I used illusions to send them on their way, but instead of learning their lesson, they went and poked my friends with cold, pointy metal!
TEXT_LUCKZC011_03394_PIXIE03394_000_002<tab>It's unforgivable! Those brazen wretches must be punished, and you'll come and punish them with me!

TEXT_LUCKZC011_03394_PIXIE03394_000_003<tab>Good! Now, to make it interesting, let us make this a race: the first to dole out punishment wins. The villains fled to the southwest─let's go and get them!
TEXT_LUCKZC011_03394_BARBARIAN03394_000_010<tab>Who are you!? The bloody pixies' minion!?
TEXT_LUCKZC011_03394_BOORISH03394_000_011<tab>The flowers are gonna make me rich! Piss off or else!
TEXT_LUCKZC011_03394_PIXIE03394_000_020<tab>What, you're done punishing them already!? Wow, you're swifter than a salamander!
TEXT_LUCKZC011_03394_PIXIE03394_000_022<tab>At any rate, justice has been served, and I doubt those mortals will try anything again. Come, let us return to Lydha Lran.
TEXT_LUCKZC011_03394_PIXIE03394_000_030<tab>Thanks to you, we may enjoy our beautiful flowers in peace again.
TEXT_LUCKZC011_03394_PIXIE03394_000_031<tab>But I must say, I'm a little disappointed that I lost our little race.

TEXT_LUCKZC011_03394_PIXIE03394_000_032<tab>I was planning to turn those thieves into leafmen, and then they could have amused me forever and ever. If you should see them again, tell them to come back!
